Articles.Content: I went to do a Gilly mission and when I planned a correction burn to get back to Kerbin everything went well. However, as soon as I left Eve's SOI my orbit around Kerbol shifted and my maneuver node was no longer accurate despite me having enough delta v to get a Kerbin encounter while still in Eve's SOI. I have tried saving and reloading multiple times but nothing has worked. Even when I planned the correction burn in Eve's SOI and got an encounter with Kerbin, I would still lose that encounter once I left Eve's SOI.
